headline.main: In Desperate Times, Talking of Torture

lead_paragraph: To the Editor: One vital element was missing from ''Torture Seeps Into Discussion by News Media,'' your Nov. 5 Business Day article about news commentators' discussion of whether the United States should use torture against terrorist suspects: the simple consideration that it does not work.
abstract: A C Willment letter says that missing from Nov 5 discussion of torture as means to get information from terrorist suspects left out vital element: that it does not work (S)
snippet: To the Editor:    One vital element was missing from ''Torture Seeps Into Discussion by News Media,'' your Nov. 5 Business Day article about news commentators' discussion of whether the United States should use torture against terrorist suspects: ...
